    @allure.story("我的流程-添加流程什么都不填点击保存，不允许保存")

    def test_affairs_process_addfail1(self, login_to_affairs):

        affairs = AffairsPage(driver)  # 用 driver 初始化 AffairsPage
        affairs.click_process()
        affairs.add_process()
        affairs.click_save()
